description:
Socket an Artifact's [slot_trait] Trait Slot with this item to gain this trait:\n\nRazorsharp:
After this creature {ACTION_attacks}, it deals damage to a random enemy equal to 35% of the attack's damage, with a 40% chance to deal 100% of the attack's damage. This effect repeats once for each {RACE_Hunter} fighting on your side.
name: Moon Glaive
